Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class FeeDAO

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.FeeDAO
public class FeeDAO extends Object
The class FeeDAO defines a model for the management of the query of the entity Fees of the database.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

      the reference of the fee or null.

    • updateFee

      public void updateFee(int id, FeeType feeType, float amount, int validityPeriod)
      Updates the information of a fee. In particular it removes the existing fee that has the specified type and then inserts a new fee of the same type with the new values.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the fee.
      feeType - the type of the fee.
      amount - the new amount of the fee.
      validityPeriod - the new period of validity of the fee.

    • removeFee

      public void removeFee(int id)
      Removes a fee from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the fee.

    • insertFee

      public void insertFee(FeeType type, float amount, int validityPeriod)
      Inserts a new fee in the database.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the fee.
      amount - the amount of the new fee.
      validityPeriod - the new validity period of the fee.
